Name: Open Console with keyboard
Description: Can I open the console using the keyboard?

Chrome.Notes: Use `Cmd+Opt+J` or `Ctrl+Shift+J` to directly open the **Console** tab.
Chrome.Name: Open Console with keyboard

Firefox.Notes: Use `Cmd+Opt+K` or `Ctrl+Shift+K` to directly open the **Console** tab.
Firefox.Name: Open Console with keyboard

Edge.Notes: Use `Cmd+Opt+J` or `Ctrl+Shift+J` to directly open the **Console** tab.
Edge.Name: Open Console with keyboard

Safari.Name: Open Console with keyboard
Safari.Notes: Use Cmd+Opt+C to directly open the **Console** tab.

Opera.Notes: Use `Cmd+Opt+J` or `Ctrl+Shift+J` to directly open the **Console** tab.
Opera.Name: Open Console with keyboard
